types.type_:Type:
from seed import Type

Type(
    decimal=1.1,
    even=2,
    name="rules",
)

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedValidation

client = SeedValidation(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.create(
    decimal=1.1,
    even=1,
    name="string",
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedValidation

client = AsyncSeedValidation(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.create(
    decimal=1.1,
    even=1,
    name="string",
)

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedValidation

client = SeedValidation(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.get(
    decimal=1.1,
    even=1,
    name="string",
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedValidation

client = AsyncSeedValidation(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.get(
    decimal=1.1,
    even=1,
    name="string",
)
